name: not an ACTION PLATFORMER game
description:
This is not an Action Platformer game.

There is a character who walks and that's it. Oh wait a minute, there are two shops. Maybe you can buy some skills to beat this game. This action game... or platformer game?? But definitely not both. You can decide what it is and play it as you wish.

In order to beat the game, you have to either kill ORCINUS ORCA or complete the platforming monument above. But beating the game is not that easy. So you may want to collect some coins and buy a couple of skills.

This game was started to be made for GeoJam 2022, a three-day game jam with a theme pick a side, but I missed the deadline by nine months😳. So anyway, i hope you enjoy it.
